section.name: Virtual Machine Demo
section.p:
Get a feeling for, and start testing, EJBCA easily by downloading and running our EJBCAv6 VM. The VM features a full EJBCA Community v6 install, running on JBoss 7.1.1.GA and Java 7, using a MariaDB database backend. It also comes with a readme file with instructions and some usage hints. The VM runs on KVM, VirtualBox and VWware®.
Have fun!

section.name: SVN over HTTPS
section.p:
The official "secure" delivery of EJBCA source code is in the repository using svn over https. The certificate is issued to cesecore.eu, which was the consortium behind the Common Criteria certification of EJBCA.
In the SVN repository you can also find the hashes of release zip files in the history of the file doc/xdocs/site/index.xml.
If you are an Enterprise customer, you may also get an official release from PrimeKey.

section.name: Help and support
section.p: You can find both free and commercial support offerings at the Contact & Support page.

section.name: Older releases
section.p: Download any of the source packages from Sourceforge.
